Vastiny - video resolution here is 624x352. That's complete and utter crap if you're watching it on a screen that's larger than about 10". 

Compare that to standard TV quality - you know, the standard resolution of the old big glass CRT televisions? Those were 640x480. This is 624x352. So yes, the video quality here is shit if you're watching it on anything other than a cellphone. 

720p (which is the lowest "hdtv" resolution) for comparison, is 1280x720. 

So this is not HD. Not in any way, shape, or form.
